text: Gumazir igiar biziba puvatɨzitam o kalabuziar gumazir tam, aningɨn tav kantrin atrivimɨn ikɨtɨ deragham. Ezɨ atrivir igharazir mam bar ghuri, egha a fofozir gumazibar nɨghnɨzir aghuiba baraghan aghua, ezɨ an arazim bar ikuvigha ongani. Guizbangɨra, atrivir igiar biziba puvatɨzir kam, a nɨghnɨzir aghuimɨn ikia, atrivir ghurir kam gafira.
